name: Nefarions
description:
Nefarions takes place in 2016, Theodore and his organization "Nefarion Watch" are set on taking down the nefarious beasts haunting the town of Plankwood. 

It is planned to be updated with more content (such as new fights) over time, the release of it now is to help gauge how players feel about the mechanics, plus if I end up ditching this project, there is at least something to show it existed.  

Instructions are in the guidebook under Notes and you can customize controls under Settings.
